author: Diane Mercier
title: Your recipe works for install Yoono on Ubuntu 13.04
text:
I repeated your recipe to install and run Yoono with Ubuntu 13.04 (64bit).
1) download: http://djlab.com/stuff/getlibs-all.deb
2) sudo dpkg -i getlibs all.deb
3) download yoono-desktop and unzip 
4) skip (Because do not say 32bit package): sudo dpkg-i - force-all some_app.deb
5) sudo getlibs ./yoono-desktop
6) make a launcher (manage launcher)
7) run: ./yoono-desktop

Regards
